languages.text: {n}Инфернус-мастер Энрих Монтэг с разбитой губой сплевывает кровь на палубу перед лежащим без чувств блюстителем. Костяшки Инфернус-мастера ободраны и покрыты кровью, в зубах — перекушенная папироса.{/n}

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернус-мастер Энрих Монтэг с разбитой губой сплевывает кровь на палубу перед лежащим без чувств блюстителем. Костяшки Инфернус-мастера ободраны и покрыты кровью, в зубах — перекушенная папироса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood on the deck in front of the enforcer lying senseless with a busted lip. Infernus Master's knuckles are scraped and covered with blood, and there is a chewed lho stick between his teeth.{/n}

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood on the deck in front of the enforcer lying senseless with a busted lip. Infernus Master's knuckles are scraped and covered with blood, and there is a chewed lho stick between his teeth.{/n}

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious and with a busted lip. His knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho stick between his teeth.{/n}

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious and with a busted lip. His knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho stick between his teeth.{/n}

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg spuckt Blut auf das Deck. Neben ihn liegt ein bewusstloser Enforcer auf dem Boden. Einrichs Lippe ist aufgeplatzt, seine Knöchel sind blutverschmiert und zwischen seinen Zähnen steckt ein angekauter Lho-Stab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg spuckt Blut auf das Deck. Neben ihn liegt ein bewusstloser Enforcer auf dem Boden. Einrichs Lippe ist aufgeplatzt, seine Knöchel sind blutverschmiert und zwischen seinen Zähnen steckt ein angekauter lho-Stab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg crache du sang aux pieds du prévôt inconscient qui gît non loin. Sa lèvre est fendue, ses jointures sont écorchées et couvertes de sang, et il serre entre ses dents un cigalho à moitié mâché.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg crache du sang aux pieds du prévôt inconscient qui gît non loin. Sa lèvre est fendue, ses jointures sont écorchées et couvertes de sang, et il serre entre ses dents un cigalho à moitié mâché.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El maestro de infernus Einrich Monteg escupe sangre al suelo de la cubierta, justo delante del guardia que yace inconsciente. Einrich tiene el labio partido, los nudillos desollados y cubiertos de sangre, y aprieta entre los dientes un cigarrillo de lho medio masticado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de infernus Einrich Monteg escupe sangre al suelo de la cubierta, justo delante del guardia que yace inconsciente. Einrich tiene el labio partido, los nudillos desollados y cubiertos de sangre, y aprieta entre los dientes un cigarrillo de lho medio masticado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターのアインリッヒ・モンテグが、意識を失って倒れているエンフォーサーのすぐ目の前で、デッキに血を吐きだす。アインリッヒの唇は裂け、拳はかすり傷と血に塗れており、その歯の間には噛み砕かれたルホスティックが挟まっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターのアインリッヒ・モンテグが、意識を失って倒れているエンフォーサーのすぐ目の前で、デッキに血を吐きだす。アインリッヒの唇は裂け、拳はかすり傷と血に塗れており、その歯の間には噛み砕かれたアイホスティックが挟まっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格朝甲板上啐了口血，啐在了他身边不省人事的执法者身边。艾因里奇的嘴唇被打破了，指关节沾满了血，齿间咬着一根被嚼过的麻烟。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格朝甲板上啐了口血，啐在了他身边不省人事的执法者身边。艾因里奇的嘴唇被打破了，指关节沾满了血，齿间咬着一根被嚼过的麻烟。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı Einrich Monteg, güvertede bilinçsiz bir şekilde yatan infazcının tam önüne kan tükürüyor. Einrich'in dudağı yarılmış, el eklemleri sıyrılıp kan içinde kalmış ve dişlerinin arasında çiğnenmiş bir liho dalı duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg spits blood onto the deck, right in front of the enforcer lying nearby, unconscious. Einrich's lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}
